info.name: Spotify - Custom Playlist Image
info.description: I wanted to have my own custom image displayed on the cover of my playlist, but that is only possible with branded playlists. That is why I made this style. Only works locally, of course.
info.additionalInfo:
Current version: 1.1

Data required:
- User and playlist URL (example: user:117914160:playlist:377l3k4kpKylbKEBWWDsKi)
- Custom image

Change log:
1.1
 - Removed playlist title.
1.0
 - Initial release.
